name: OldSchool Tape&Pencil
description:
OldSchool Tape&Pencil was made in 48hours for the Brakeys GameJam 2020.2.

The player will have a burst of nostalgia when he will have to REWIND the tape in order to positionate himself and avoid the obstacles.

The game uses a minimalist design with simple shapes.

Technologies used : 

Game engine : Unity

Image Editing : Photoshop

3D modeling/editing : Blender
